title: Academic Resources
desc: Here you can find all the resources of a particular course. Resources can be videos, blogs, books, etc.

title: Events
desc: It contains all the co-curricular events taking place in Pakistan. Sign up for an event you're interested in and make us proud!

title: Instructors
desc: List of all instructors and departments at Habib University.

title: Suggest a Resource!
desc: Help your fellow Habibians too! If you find a resource for a particular course that you think is relevant and important, please suggest the resource to the admin so that we can include it.
